Package progetto.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExecuibleGame  
    IGame  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGameAction
    This is the class every command must be derived from.
    AbstractGameState  
    AbstractProcessor<T>
    This interface that represents a object that can receive items to be processed.
    AddWindowFrameCoupleAction
    add a window frame couple to the game
    CommandQueue
    Command queue of the game
    Couple
    Support class to find nearby locations in the window
    Dice
    Dice with a color and a value (immutable)
    DiceBag
    Dice bag with 90 dices in 5 colors
    DicePlacedFrame
    Player window with positioned dice
    DicePlacedFrameData
    Immutable class with data of DicePlacedFrame
    DicePlacementCondition
    Immutable class where compliance with the positioning constraints of a dice in the window frame is verified Rules for placing dice: -First dice to be placed along the edges -Other dice near one of those already positioned (orthogonally or diagonally) -Respect the imposed value and color constraints of the scheme -No dice near orthogonally with same color and/or same value -No two dice in the same position Rules that can be ignored thanks to the effects of the cards: -Ingore color bond -Ingore value bond -Ignore constraint of proximity to another dice
    EndGameState  
    EndRoundState  
    EndTurnAction  
    ExtractedDices
    Dices extracted by the player on the main board
    ExtractedDicesData
    Immutable class with data of ExtractedDices
    FrameSelectionState
    Distribution of private cards Selection of public cards Loading Window Frame from File
    FrameSetAction  
    Game
    Current state of the game
    GameStartedState  
    MainBoard
    Main gaming table
    MainBoardData
    Immutable class with data of MainBoard
    NineDices
    Immutable support class with dices in a position of the roundTrack
    PickDiceAction  
    PickedDicesSlot
    Dices that still need to be placed that have been taken by the player
    PickedDicesSlotData
    Slot for picked dices (immutable)
    PlaceDiceAction  
    PlayerBoard
    Player table
    PlayerBoardData
    Immutable class with data of PlayerBoard
    PreGameState  
    RNGenerator
    Class used to generate random values (with seed), platform independent
    RoundState  
    RoundTrack
    RoundTrack with advanced dice
    RoundTrackData
    Immuutable class with data of RoundTrack
    SetPlayerCountAction  
    SetSeedAction  
    StartGameAction
    starts the game
